Bandolier.card_desc: [Nade Launcher] Reduce the cooldown of Nade Launcher by {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Burn, Monster!.card_desc: [Fire Bomb] Fire Bomb now Cripples enemies and deals 50% more damage.

Favored Quarry.card_desc: [Hunter's Mark] The reveal portion of your Hunter's Mark lasts {scale=1|1}s longer.

Hunting Party.card_desc: [Hunter's Mark] Hunter's Mark now has 2 Charges and also benefits allies. It has a 2s reduced cooldown and the bonus damage is increased to 25%.

Hunting Season.card_desc: [Hunter's Mark] Gain {scale=200|200} Health if you kill your Hunter's Mark target.

In The Fray.card_desc: [Nade Launcher] Activating Nade Launcher grants {scale=4|4}% damage reduction for 3s.

Incensed.card_desc: [Fire Bomb] Gain {scale=8|8}% movement speed for 4s when activating Fire Bomb.

Mercy Kill.card_desc: [Nade Launcher] Nade Launcher now has 3 charges.

Napalm.card_desc: [Fire Bomb] Activating Fire Bomb restores {scale=4|4} ammunition.

Primal Might.card_desc: [Armor] Getting an elimination reduces all active cooldowns by {scale=10|10}%

Quick Release.card_desc: [Nade Launcher] Activating Nade Launcher generates {scale=2|2} ammo.

Ranger.card_desc: [Hunter's Mark] Reduce the cooldown of Hunter's Mark by {scale=1|1}s.

Salamander Hide.card_desc: [Fire Bomb] Reduce self damage taken from Fire Bomb by {scale=20|20}%

Tracker.card_desc: [Hunter's Mark] Gain {scale=5|5}% Movement Speed while Hunter's Mark is active.

Turn The Table.card_desc: [Nade Launcher] Heal for {scale=50|50} after hitting an enemy with Nade Launcher.

Volatile.card_desc: [Fire Bomb] Reduce the cooldown of Fire Bomb by {scale=1|1}s.
